entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 30 gusting to 60 this morning then light this afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
